articles.title: UFC 321 Power Rankings: Rating The Main Card Winners In Abu Dhabi
articles.description: With a loaded fight card and plenty of high stakes involved, UFC 321 promised much at Etihad Arena, but on a night that ended in anti-climactic fashion, who came away from their main card matchups with their stock the highest? Simon Head presents his UFC 321 Power Rankings.

articles.title: Gane Gets Another Shot — Is Aspinall Still the Heavy Favorite?
articles.description: Start fresh at https://tryfum.com/products/zero-crisp-mint. Over 500,000 people have already made the switch — no nicotine, no vapor, no batteries. Just flavor, fidget, and a fresh start. UFC 321's main event ended in controversy as Tom Aspinall's first title defense against Ciryl Gane was halted due to an accidental eye poke. Despite the no-contest outcome, the question remains: Is Aspinall still the favorite in a potential rematch? In this video, Chael Analyzes the fight's dynamics, examining Aspinall's striking power and Gane's defensive skills. We also discuss the psychological impact on both fighters and speculate on how the betting odds might shift for a future bout. Join us as we break down the key moments and what they mean for the heavyweight division. Tom Aspinall, Ciryl Gane, UFC 321, heavyweight title, no contest, eye poke, UFC rematch, betting odds, UFC analysis, UFC news. Bad Guy Inc merch now available at https://BadGuyInc.com Click here to subscribe: https://bit.ly/3FrHIPK Follow me on IG: https://bit.ly/3HY7BIE Follow me on Twitter: https://bit.ly/3tvY5J7 All things UFC and MMA with the undefeated Bad Guy, Chael Sonnen. UFC Champions, Jon Jones, Conor McGregor, Colby Covington, Khamzat Chimaev, the MMA hour and commentary on the latest UFC news, UFC Champions in 2022, UFC knockouts and finishes.

articles.title: Mackenzie Dern Wins UFC Championship After Being Taken Down 9 Times…
articles.description: 💥 Watch as Mackenzie Dern defies the odds and captures the UFC Strawweight Championship — even after being taken down nine times! 👑 In this video, we break down how Dern turned the tide: absorbing repeated takedowns, capitalizing on her guard game, and unleashing strikes from the bottom to secure the win. Her relentless “want-it” attitude set her apart. 📌 Expect fight highlights, tactical analysis of Dern’s ground defense and offense, and insights into how she transformed adversity into triumph. #UFC #MackenzieDern #StrawweightChampion #FightAnalysis #MMAHighlights #TakedownDefense #UnderdogVictory Bad Guy Inc merch now available at https://BadGuyInc.com Click here to subscribe: https://bit.ly/3FrHIPK Follow me on IG: https://bit.ly/3HY7BIE Follow me on Twitter: https://bit.ly/3tvY5J7 All things UFC and MMA with the undefeated Bad Guy, Chael Sonnen. articles.description: Daniel Cormier IS BACK live from Abu Dhabi UFC 321 to give his post-fight reaction to Tom Aspinall vs. Ciryl Gane being ruled a NO CONTEST after an eye poke to Tom! DC weight in on the controversial end to the fight, and what that means for Gane and Aspinall moving forward. Plus, Cormier gives his take on Mackenzie Dern's title fight win in the co-main event. articles.title: Paddy Pimblett EXPOSES Ilia Topuria, He WON’T Sign the Contract — He’s Stalling!”
articles.description: Don’t miss out on all the action this week at DraftKings! Download the DraftKings app today! Sign-up using https://dkng.co/sonnen or through my promo code SONNEN Paddy Pimblett claims Ilia Topuria won’t sign the contract to fight him — calling the UFC featherweight champ a staller who’s avoiding the matchup everyone wants to see. But is Topuria really ducking Paddy, or is there more going on behind the scenes? In this episode, Chael Sonnen breaks down the truth behind Paddy’s comments, how the UFC might be timing this fight for maximum impact, and why patience sometimes pays off when it comes to matchmaking. Plus, Chael explains what this means for the featherweight division heading into 2025 and whether Paddy’s callout is a smart career move… or a risky one. 💬 Drop your thoughts: Is Ilia Topuria avoiding Paddy Pimblett, or is Paddy just chasing headlines? articles.title: What Is BKFC? | An Uncrowned Film
articles.description: For the very first release from Uncrowned Films, Ariel Helwani travels to New Jersey to answer one simple question: What is BKFC? Ariel gets a taste of every part of the experience, speaking to staff and officials before the event begins, going-behind the scenes with several athletes, and sitting ringside for the night's main event.
